name: burgerbuilder
description: + Burger Me is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. + Whenever a user submits a burger's name, it is displayed on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured! + Each burger in the waiting area has a "Devour it!" button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page and is "devoured." + Every burger is stored in a mysql database, whether devoured or not.
